tool_description: Checks real-time inventory levels and availability for specified items across different locations and channels.

item_ids.description: Array of item IDs to check inventory for

location_code.description: Warehouse or store location code for inventory check

channel.description: Sales channel (online, store, mobile) for channel-specific inventory

include_reserved.description: Whether to include reserved inventory in availability calculation

error_messages: Invalid item IDs: Ensure all item IDs in the array are valid and non-empty strings.
Location not found: The specified location_code does not exist in the system.
Invalid channel: Use one of the supported channels: online, store, mobile.
Too many items: Maximum 50 items can be checked in a single request.
Inventory service unavailable: Try again later or contact support if the issue persists.
usage: Provide an array of item_ids to check inventory levels. Optionally specify location_code, channel, and include_reserved for more precise inventory information.

inventory_results.description: Array of inventory status strings for each requested item

available_quantities.description: Array of available quantities corresponding to each item ID

last_updated.description: Timestamp when inventory was last updated
